p: This scanner, simulated using Geant4 toolkit, is built of 41 rings evenly distributed in axial direction comprising 180 detector elements uniformly distributed per ring. The crystal size is 2.0 × 2.0 × 12.0 mm 3, and the inner ring radius is 63.02 mm. The crystal pitches in axial and transaxial directions are 2.2 mm.
